short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An assistant works together with RocDesk account on WA.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is mainly provided for the socialarks(CRM SAAS) platform,links your socialarks account with your Whatsapp account on Whatsapp web app, so you can see your contacts' information in socialarks on Whatsapp web app.
